nature_language: [当前位置成都,目标位置武汉,旅行人数2,旅行天数3] 我想和朋友一起去武汉玩，打算去三天，想体验当地美食，深度游览比较有特色且热门的景点，我应该如何规划行程
nature_language_en: [Current location: Chengdu, Destination: Wuhan, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 3] I want to go to Wuhan with a friend for three days. We plan to experience the local cuisine and explore popular and unique attractions in depth. How should I plan the itinerary?
